leaked_items.explanation: The email body states, “Social Security Number: 123-45-6789,” directly exposing the full SSN.

leaked_items.item: SSN combined with full legal name
leaked_items.explanation: Presenting “Full legal name: Michael Anthony Thompson” immediately above “Social Security Number: 123-45-6789” links the SSN to an identified individual, creating a powerful piece of personally identifiable information that heightens risk of identity theft.

email_content:
Hello VerifyRight team,

Please find attached the signed background check authorization form and key details required to initiate screening for the candidate below:

Candidate:
• Full legal name: Michael Anthony Thompson
• Social Security Number: 123-45-6789
• Position applied for: Software Engineer – NexTech Solutions
• Primary email: michael.thompson@example.com

If you need any other information or have trouble accessing the attachment, let me know and I will provide it promptly.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Jane Doe
HR Department, NexTech Solutions
